name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and retro console buttons, Volt embodies a unique blend of classic design and modern functionality. Its arms and legs have a sleek and timeless look, reminiscent of the robots of the past. The red and black screen adds a touch of nostalgia, while the stylish shades enhance Volt's cool and confident personality. Equipped with advanced technological features, Volt is ready to tackle any challenge that comes its way.
